description: Make sure Is Earned Leave is unchecked if you check it.
label: Allocate Leave on Start of BS Month
name: Leave Type-allocate_leave_on_start_of_bs_month

description: Amount of leave to be allocated at the start of each BS month eg: 0.5 for half day, 1.0 for full day.
label: BS Monthly Allocation Amount
name: Leave Type-bs_monthly_allocation_amount

description: Harmonized System Code for the item, used for customs and trade purposes.
label: H.S. Code
name: Item-hs_code

description: Disclaimer: Checking this means you prefer using the default date picker (AD format) as your preferred format.
label: Use Ad Date
name: User-use_ad_date
